notes.title: Start a zombie apocalypse
notes.text: Finish crafting formula that will turn the dead into mindless, brain-craving monsters that only I can control.

notes.title: Cheer up the survivors
notes.text: Teach the zombies to dance and do card tricks.

notes.title: Regret my actions
notes.text: Attempt to reverse the damage I have caused, probably resulting in my ironic demise at the hands of the zombie horde I created.
